definition: to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Also increased the special effect of anthocyanins with skincare.
sentences.chinese: 还特增加了具有养颜美容的效果花青素。

sentences.english: The activity is healthy, environment friendly, and worth spreading. O yeah.
sentences.chinese: 该活动低炭减肥排毒养颜，值得推广。

sentences.english: Aloe extract hydrates, beautifies, whitens and softens skin.
sentences.chinese: 芦荟提取液清润养颜，美白柔肤。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of anti-aging effect of Yangyan Quban particles on the aging skin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨内服养颜祛斑颗粒抗皮肤衰老作用及机制。

definition: to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
